text.title: Card Co-occurrence in NetrunnerDB Decks
text.more: Nodes represent individual cards, and connections between cards indicate co-occurrence of cards in at least one deck. The distance between nodes indicates the frequency of co-occurrence across all decks, so commonly used cards are central to the graph, while rarely used cards (*cough Exploratory Romp cough*) appear on the outskirts. Mouse over nodes to see card names, and click nodes to view card images alongside the subset of cards also used with that card.
text.intro: Generated based on public NetrunnerDB decks published from 1/1/2013 - 6/28/2015. Includes card through Chrome City.
